description: A colony on the north shore of Sicily founded in 649/8 BC by the Myletidai.

names.details: Himera is listed as "Imera" in the BTCGI. Also, the archaeological site of Himera is often called "Imera" in modern Italian.

references.formattedCitation: BTCGI VIII, 248-73
